me.alexishaldy.db.pool

Class DBConnectionPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.alexishaldy.db.pool.DBConnectionPool

  • public class DBConnectionPool
extends Object
    This class defines a pool of database connections It implements the Object Pool design pattern (and the Singleton design pattern)
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ronald T. Fernandez
    See Also:
    DBConnection

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_CONNECTIONS
      Size of the connection pool

      Get a ConnectionPool instance.
      DBConnection popConnection()
      Get a connection from the pool

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_CONNECTIONS

        public static int MAX_CONNECTIONS
        Size of the connection pool

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DBConnectionPool getInstance()
                                    throws Exception
        Get a ConnectionPool instance. It is used to implement the Singleton design pattern.
        Returns:
        An instance to the ConnectionPool
        Throws:
        DBException - Throws an exception in case a problem with the DB has occurred
        Exception

      • popConnection

        public DBConnection popConnection()
                           throws Exception
        Get a connection from the pool
        Returns:
        A connection to the database
        Throws:
        DBException - Throws an exception in case a problem with the DB has occurred
        Exception
        See Also:
        DBConnection

      • pushConnection

        public void pushConnection(DBConnection connection)
                    throws Exception
        This method allows returning a database connection to the pool
        Parameters:
        connection - Connection to be returned to the pool
        Throws:
        DBException - Throws an exception in case a problem with the DB has occurred
        Exception
